author: garry mitchell
content: What can I say  ive been going to This N that  since I was 19 working in Tandys in Manchester Arndale, even when I left there I carried on going , the food wa s and still is out of this world  for the pricee in the city centre ,  always fresh and tasty and different menus daily, I love the kebab sandwiches they make freshly cooked as you go in m nice and spicy but not too hot  with a fresh salad served on a fresh made Nann and then theres the sauce they put on its like a mint and chilli  without the yoghurt, s lovely cool at first and then a nice kick, I now live in Lincoln and up until a few months ago I used to travel over to Manchester to This N that  and get a few kebabs  and curries to bring back with me  I fully recommended a visit here, ,All can  say  after thirty years   its got to be good , a massive well done to all the staff past n present
